License The app is completely open source and licensed under GPL3.
Libraries The following open source libraries ar used in the app.
Image quality Set the image quality. Higher quality results in (much) bigger PDF sizes.
Backup Do you want to backup pdf files before manipulating, e.g. deleting or adding pages?
Default directory Use the default directory: \"/Android/data/de.baumann.pdf/\".
Custom directory Change the default app directory, where new PDF files and backups will be saved. Enter the path to your desired folder on your sdcard. The path must begin and end with \"/\" like \"/Download/PDF/\". If the desired directory does not exist, it will be generated automatically. /Download/PDF/…
User password Set the user password for PDF files. It is used to open the PDF file after encryption. Copy and printing is still allowed after decryption. It can be changed by long pressing the encryption icon in the \"+text | …\" tab.
Owner password Set the owner password for encrypted PDF files. If somebody wants to edit the file later he needs this password.
Author Who is the author of the PDF? You can enter for example your name: \"Max Mustermann\". Can be changed by long pressing the tag icon in the \"+text | …\" tab.
Creator Who created the PDF? Perhaps this app: \"PDF Creator using iText\"? Can be changed by long pressing the tag icon in the \"+text | …\" tab.
Keywords Set keywords for your PDFs, separated by commas: \"Metadata, iText, PDF\". Can be changed by long pressing the tag icon in the \"+text | …\" tab.
Subject Subject of your PDF file: \"This example shows how to add metadata\". Can be changed by long pressing the tag icon in the \"+text | …\" tab.
Portrait Use portrait format for PDF pages. You can easily switch between portrait and landscape by clicking the displayed pdf name at the bottom of the screen. The actual format is also shown.
Help dialog Show the help dialog on start.
